text: (Qavmi Muso dar hole ki muddati ʙisjore dar azoʙi Fir'avn ʙudand,) guftand: «Pes az on ki tu ʙijoi, dar ranc ʙudem va pas az on ki omadi, ʙoz dar rancem». (Muso ononro ʙa piruzi umedvor karda guft): «Umed ast, ki Parvardigoraton dusmanatonro halok kunad va sumoro dar rui zamin xalifa gardonad. On goh ʙingarad, ki ci mekuned! Ojo sukri Uro ʙa co meored jo ne? (In va'dae ʙud, ki Alloh dar zamoni muqarrar ʙa on vafo kard)»
